TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit InstrumentationClassAttribute extends System.Attribute

summary.span: Specifies that a class provides event or instance instrumentation.

span.span: Specifies that a class provides event or instance instrumentation.

summary.span: Note: the WMI .NET libraries are now considered in final state, and no further development, enhancements, or updates will be available for non-security related issues affecting these libraries.

param.span: The type of instrumentation provided by this class.

summary.span: Initializes a new instance of the class that is used if this type is derived from another type that has the attribute, or if this is a top-level instrumentation class (for example, an instance or abstract class without a base class, or an event derived from **__ExtrinsicEvent**).

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class that is used if this type is derived from another type that has the attribute, or if this is a top-level instrumentation class (for example, an instance or abstract class without a base class, or an event derived from **__ExtrinsicEvent**).

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 完全信任立即呼叫者。Full trust for the immediate caller. 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).

summary.span: Initializes a new instance of the class that has schema for an existing base class.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class that has schema for an existing base class.

summary.span: The class must contain proper member definitions for the properties of the existing WMI base class.

span.span: The class must contain proper member definitions for the properties of the existing WMI base class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 完全信任立即呼叫者。Full trust for the immediate caller. 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property InstrumentationType As InstrumentationType

summary.span: Gets or sets the type of instrumentation provided by this class.

span.span: Gets or sets the type of instrumentation provided by this class.

value.span: 傳回包含由這個類別所提供的檢測類型的列舉值。

span.span: Returns an enumeration value containing the type of instrumentation provided by this class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 屬性值Property Value 包含值，指出這是否已經過檢測的事件、 執行個體或抽象類別。Contains an value that indicates whether this is an instrumented event, instance, or abstract class. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 完全信任立即呼叫者。Full trust for the immediate caller. 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ManagedBaseClassName As String
public: property System::String ^ ManagedBaseClassName { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: Gets or sets the name of the base class of this instrumentation class.

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the base class of this instrumentation class.

value.span: 傳回值，其中包含這個檢測類別的基底類別的名稱。

span.span: Returns a value containing the name of the base class of this instrumentation class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 屬性值Property Value 如果沒有`null`，這個字串表示此類別繼承自 CIM 結構描述中的 WMI 基底類別。If not `null`, this string indicates the WMI base class that this class inherits from in the CIM schema. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 完全信任立即呼叫者。Full trust for the immediate caller. 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).
